name: Paul Sauer 2006
description:
*‘Iconic blend led by Cabernet Sauvignon, with Cabernet Franc, Merlot - 65/20/15 in 06; classic style after more modern 05; impressively powerful: dense, richly layered fruit shows remarkable depth and complexity. 2 yrs new Fr oak effortlessly absorbed.’* - Platter’s SA Wine Guide, 5☆ (2010)

 ‘Rich but racy, with tangy minerality coursing through the core of loganberry, plum and fig fruit flavors. There's also roasted mesquite and iron, adding length to the finish, where a maduro tobacco note lingers. Should age nicely.’ - James Molesworth, Wine Spectator, 92/100 (Jun 2010) The wines will be cellared at Wine Cellar (Professional wine storage, Cape Town) vintage cellar until maturity (estimated 2028) or withdrawal.
